mixed.name: Grain
mixed.description: Used to emulate film grain. The grain pattern is both mixed and multiplied over the image

mixed.name: Haze
mixed.description: A large scale blur applied to the input to imitate a hazy lens or filter

mixed.name: Sharpen
mixed.description: Adds a sharpening process to the image, done in logarithmic space to avoid artifacts

mixed.name: Vignette
mixed.description: Adds a vignette effect to the image, designed to emulate real cameras

unmixed.name: Anamorphic Bloom
unmixed.description: A bloom effect that is similar to glare seen in anamorphic lenses using 5-step box blur on the Y axis

unmixed.name: Anamorphic Ghost
unmixed.description: A ghosting effect along the Y axis that is seen in anamorphic lens flares

unmixed.name: Bloom
unmixed.description: A bloom effect seen in lenses of all kinds (even the human eye) using a 10-step gaussian blur

color.name: Chroma
color.description: Alters the saturation/chroma of the image using a power function for smoother falloff with correction for saturation

batches.name: Anamorphic Flare
batches.description: Combines Anamorphic Bloom and Anamorphic Ghost together

utilities.name: Image Add
utilities.description: Add operation that allows an RGB image to be a factor for the operation

utilities.name: Per-pixel Random Noise
utilities.description: Per-pixel random noise based on the resolution of the input image

dev.name: Bloom 5-step Box Blur
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes

dev.name: Bloom 10-step Blur
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes

dev.name: Global Colorspace Conversion
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes

dev.name: Global Textures
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes

dev.name: Grain Mosaic
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes

dev.name: Mosaic 9-way Mix
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes

dev.name: Mosaic Clamp
dev.description: A node used for developing Compositor Pro nodes
